entry.name: MAV_CMD_PILOT_DEFINED_VEHICLE_GPS
entry.description: User defined current global pose of the vehicle. This is exclusively sent from t Unused. To utilize this parameter update the RAS-A standard Unused. To utilize this parameter update the RAS-A standard Unused. To utilize this parameter update the RAS-A standard Unused. To utilize this parameter update the RAS-A standard Current global yaw of the vehicle. NaN to use the current system yaw. Latitude unscaled Longitude unscaled Altitude (MSL). NaN to use the current system altitude.
